lexUnit.name: arraignment.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the calling of a defendant before a court to answer a criminal charge

sentence.text: It 's because of this -- the magnanimity even more than the political expertise -- that Olson 's appalled and self-questioning reflections on Pound 's arraignment and incarceration make all others seem puerile at best .
